name: Shiller PE Ratio by Month
description: Shiller PE ratio for the S&P 500. Price earnings ratio is based on average inflation-adjusted earnings from the previous 10 years, known as the Cyclically Adjusted PE Ratio (CAPE Ratio), Shiller PE Ratio, or PE 10 FAQ. Data courtesy of Robert Shiller from his book, Irrational Exuberance.

name: Shiller PE Ratio by Year
description: Shiller PE ratio for the S&P 500. Price earnings ratio is based on average inflation-adjusted earnings from the previous 10 years, known as the Cyclically Adjusted PE Ratio (CAPE Ratio), Shiller PE Ratio, or PE 10 FAQ. Data courtesy of Robert Shiller from his book, Irrational Exuberance.

name: S&P 500 Book Value Per Share by Quarter
description: S&P 500 book value per share non-inflation adjusted current dollars. Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Book Value Per Share by Year
description: S&P 500 book value per share non-inflation adjusted current dollars. Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Dividend Growth by Quarter
description: S&P 500 dividend growth rate per year. Annual current dollars percentage change in 12 month dividend per share (not inflation adjusted). Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Dividend Growth by Year
description: S&P 500 dividend growth rate per year. Annual current dollars percentage change in 12 month dividend per share (not inflation adjusted). Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Dividend by Month
description: 12-month real dividend per share inflation adjusted June, 2022 dollars. Data courtesy Standard & Poor's and Robert Shiller.

name: S&P 500 Dividend by Year
description: 12-month real dividend per share inflation adjusted June, 2022 dollars. Data courtesy Standard & Poor's and Robert Shiller.

name: S&P 500 Dividend Yield by Month
description: S&P 500 dividend yield (12 month dividend per share)/price. Yields following June 2022 (including the current yield) are estimated based on 12 month dividends through June 2022, as reported by S&P. Sources: Standard & Poor's for current S&P 500 Dividend Yield. Robert Shiller and his book Irrational Exuberance for historic S&P 500 Dividend Yields.

name: S&P 500 Dividend Yield by Year
description: S&P 500 dividend yield (12 month dividend per share)/price. Yields following June 2022 (including the current yield) are estimated based on 12 month dividends through June 2022, as reported by S&P. Sources: Standard & Poor's for current S&P 500 Dividend Yield. Robert Shiller and his book Irrational Exuberance for historic S&P 500 Dividend Yields.

name: S&P 500 Earnings Growth Rate by Quarter
description: S&P 500 earnings growth rate per year. Annual current dollars percentage change in 12 month earnings per share, (not inflation adjusted). Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Earnings Growth Rate by Year
description: S&P 500 earnings growth rate per year. Annual current dollars percentage change in 12 month earnings per share, (not inflation adjusted). Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Earnings by Month
description: S&P 500 Earnings Per Share. 12-month real earnings per share inflation adjusted, constant June, 2022 dollars. Sources: Standard & Poor's for current S&P 500 Earnings. Robert Shiller and his book Irrational Exuberance for historic S&P 500 Earnings.

name: S&P 500 Earnings by Year
description: S&P 500 Earnings Per Share. 12-month real earnings per share inflation adjusted, constant June, 2022 dollars. Sources: Standard & Poor's for current S&P 500 Earnings. Robert Shiller and his book Irrational Exuberance for historic S&P 500 Earnings.

name: S&P 500 Earnings Yield by Month
description: S&P 500 Earnings Yield. Earnings Yield = trailing 12 month earnings divided by index price (or inverse PE) Yields following March, 2022 (including current yield) are estimated based on 12 month earnings through March, 2022 the latest reported by S&P. Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Earnings Yield by Year
description: S&P 500 Earnings Yield. Earnings Yield = trailing 12 month earnings divided by index price (or inverse PE) Yields following March, 2022 (including current yield) are estimated based on 12 month earnings through March, 2022 the latest reported by S&P. Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Inflation Adjusted by Month
description: Inflation adjusted, constant June, 2022 dollars. Other than the current price, all prices are monthly average closing prices. Sources: Standard & Poor's Robert Shiller and his book Irrational Exuberance for historic S&P 500 prices, and historic CPIs.

name: S&P 500 Inflation Adjusted by Year
description: Inflation adjusted, constant June, 2022 dollars. Other than the current price, all prices are monthly average closing prices. Sources: Standard & Poor's Robert Shiller and his book Irrational Exuberance for historic S&P 500 prices, and historic CPIs.

name: S&P 500 Price to Book Value by Quarter
description: S&P 500 price to book value ratio. Current price to book ratio is estimated based on current market price and S&P 500 book value as of December, 2021 the latest reported by S&P. Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Price to Book Value by Year
description: S&P 500 price to book value ratio. Current price to book ratio is estimated based on current market price and S&P 500 book value as of December, 2021 the latest reported by S&P. Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 PE Ratio by Month
description: Price to earnings ratio, based on trailing twelve month as reported earnings. Current PE is estimated from latest reported earnings and current market price. Source: Robert Shiller and his book Irrational Exuberance for historic S&P 500 PE Ratio.

name: S&P 500 PE Ratio by Year
description: Price to earnings ratio, based on trailing twelve month as reported earnings. Current PE is estimated from latest reported earnings and current market price. Source: Robert Shiller and his book Irrational Exuberance for historic S&P 500 PE Ratio.

name: S&P 500 Price to Sales Ratio by Quarter
description: S&P 500 Price to Sales Ratio (P/S or Price to Revenue). Current price to sales ratio is estimated based on current market price and 12 month sales ending March, 2022 the latest reported by S&P. Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Price to Sales Ratio by Year
description: S&P 500 Price to Sales Ratio (P/S or Price to Revenue). Current price to sales ratio is estimated based on current market price and 12 month sales ending March, 2022 the latest reported by S&P. Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Real Earnings Growth by Quarter
description: S&P 500 real earnings growth rate per year. Annual percentage change in 12 month S&P 500 Real Earnings Per Share (inflation adjusted). Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Real Earnings Growth by Year
description: S&P 500 real earnings growth rate per year. Annual percentage change in 12 month S&P 500 Real Earnings Per Share (inflation adjusted). Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Real Price by Month
description: S&P 500 historical prices. Prices are not inflation-adjusted. For inflation-adjusted comparison, see Inflation Adjusted S&P 500. Other than the current price, all prices are monthly average closing prices. Sources: Standard & Poor's Robert Shiller and his book Irrational Exuberance for historic S&P 500 prices, and historic CPIs.

name: S&P 500 Real Price by Year
description: S&P 500 historical prices. Prices are not inflation-adjusted. For inflation-adjusted comparison, see Inflation Adjusted S&P 500. Other than the current price, all prices are monthly average closing prices. Sources: Standard & Poor's Robert Shiller and his book Irrational Exuberance for historic S&P 500 prices, and historic CPIs.

name: S&P 500 Real Sales Growth by Quarter
description: S&P 500 real sales growth rate per year. Annual percentage change in 12 month S&P 500 Real Sales (inflation adjusted). Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Real Sales Growth by Year
description: S&P 500 real sales growth rate per year. Annual percentage change in 12 month S&P 500 Real Sales (inflation adjusted). Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Real Sales by Quarter
description: Trailing twelve month S&P 500 Sales Per Share (S&P 500 Revenue Per Share) inflation-adjusted June, 2022 constant Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Real Sales by Year
description: Trailing twelve month S&P 500 Sales Per Share (S&P 500 Revenue Per Share) inflation-adjusted June, 2022 constant Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Sales Growth Rate by Quarter
description: S&P 500 sales growth rate per year. Annual percentage change in 12 month S&P 500 Sales (not-inflation adjusted). Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Sales Growth Rate by Year
description: S&P 500 sales growth rate per year. Annual percentage change in 12 month S&P 500 Sales (not-inflation adjusted). Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Sales by Quarter
description: Trailing twelve month S&P 500 Sales Per Share (S&P 500 Revenue Per Share) non-inflation adjusted current dollars. Source: Standard & Poor's

name: S&P 500 Sales by Year
description: Trailing twelve month S&P 500 Sales Per Share (S&P 500 Revenue Per Share) non-inflation adjusted current dollars. Source: Standard & Poor's
